name: Exonerated
description:
changingHello,

Welcome at the page of Exonerated, Exonerated is a shooter/platform rpg 2D game in development. The goal of this game is to free the world from badguys, this most be done in special boss levels which will need a unique way to battle them. The game will be fast-paced and will have several challanges and achievements! The current gameplay is just a small demo/early alpha, but it will be updated very regulary!

The game is currently in an alpha 0.0.1.5 stage, this means the game isn't big enough yet to be sold, this means you can download it for free. Once the game has more progress we will set an price, so take your chance and download it now you can!

== Changelist from alpha 0.0.1 to alpha 0.0.1.5 ==

-Removed a few bugs

-Changed spawn point because of almost instant die
